[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ background_image=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/17C8474.jpg” min_height=”350px” custom_padding=”|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22.3″ custom_padding=”56px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25.3″ custom_margin=”-16px|auto||auto||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.0.9″ header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#00578c” global_colors_info=”{}”]

About Dot Transportation

In 1960, Dot Foods Founder Robert Tracy was making his first deliveries out of the back of the Tracy family station wagon. Now, Dot Transportation, Inc. (DTI) operates a fleet of over 1,300 trucks out of 12 distribution centers (DC) across the country with the help of 2,000+ employees. Our growth has allowed us to bring more and more people onto the DTI team. But—despite our growth—job security and safety will never stop being some of our top priorities.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_divider color=”#d8d8d8″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.9″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.9″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.9″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dot Transportation Fast Facts

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″ custom_margin=”|auto|-10px|auto||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_number_counter title=”Zero Layoffs Ever” percent_sign=”off” _builder_version=”4.9.9″ title_font=”||||||||” title_text_color=”#3f3f3f” title_font_size=”20px” number_font=”Open Sans||||||||” number_text_color=”#0065a4″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_number_counter][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_number_counter title=”2018 Motor Vehicle Accident (MVA) Rate” number=”3.5″ percent_sign=”off” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ title_font=”||||||||” title_text_color=”#3f3f3f” title_font_size=”20px” number_font=”Open Sans||||||||” number_text_color=”#0065a4″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_number_counter][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_number_counter title=”Carrier Safety Administration (CSA) Crash Score ” number=”8″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″ title_font=”||||||||” title_text_color=”#3f3f3f” title_font_size=”20px” number_font=”Open Sans||||||||” number_text_color=”#0065a4″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_number_counter][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.9″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f9f9f9″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.9″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.9″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.9″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dot Transportation Wins Private Fleet of the Year Award from FleetOwner

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.9″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.9″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/aboutusfleetowner.jpg” alt=”Fleet Owner 500 Private Fleet of the Year” title_text=”Fleet Owner 500 Private Fleet of the Year” _builder_version=”4.9.9″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.9″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.9″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

This award recognized the effort a lot of people made in all departments across Dot—not just DTI,” said DTI President Bryan Langston. “This is recognition for everything we did as an organization to not only mitigate the impact of 2020 to our team, but also to provide food, resources, and other solutions to the communities in need that we serve and live in.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://drivefordot.com/blog/driving-for-an-award-winning-private-fleet/” button_text=”Read More” _builder_version=”4.9.9″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”12px” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_color=”#0082ca” button_border_radius=”4px” button_use_icon=”off” custom_padding=”8px|25px|8px|25px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Apply Now CTA” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f9f9f9″ background_enable_color=”off” saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}” global_module=”33908″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#0065a4″ min_height=”125px” custom_margin=”35px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Apply-Now@2x.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” height_tablet=”226px” height_phone=”150px” height_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_3_font=”|700|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_3_font_size=”25px” header_3_line_height=”1.7em” custom_margin=”8%||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|20px||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”|20px||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Apply Today & Discover Your Forever Career

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”https://intelliapp.driverapponline.com/c/dotfoods?r=drivefordot” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Apply Now” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”13%||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”0%||35px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”0%||30px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”18px” animation_style=”bounce” animation_direction=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Need More Information Before You Apply? We’d love to talk to you.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px” custom_padding_phone=”” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ custom_padding=”34px|||||” custom_padding_tablet=”||0px” custom_padding_phone=”” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”Open Sans||||||||” header_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#333″ header_2_font_size=”25px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Job Security: Zero Layoffs in Company History

DTI has been around for over 30  years, and we’ve never laid off a single person. Not once.

We understand the importance of job security and stability. Our 2,000+ employees rely on us so their families can rely on them—so our priority is to keep their jobs safe and secure.

From the beginning, the focus has been on you and the way you deserve to be treated. So we put a lot of effort into creating an environment filled with good people who care about you (our drivers), treat you with respect, and provide you with the job security you’ve been looking for.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/17C9849.jpg” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″ custom_margin=”|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”60px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/30795794857_3e2c8c504f_o.jpg” disabled_on=”on|on|off” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”Open Sans||||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”25px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Safety

Our corporate incentive and safety recognition programs have encouraged our drivers to be some of the safest on the road. Plus, DTI is an industry leader when it comes to minimal personal injuries to our drivers.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ custom_padding_tablet=”0px||” custom_padding_phone=”” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.0.6″ header_font=”Open Sans||||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”25px” custom_margin=”50px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dot by the Numbers

As Dot’s transportation subsidiary, DTI has grown right along side Dot Foods. The company’s original “fleet” was the Tracy family station wagon and a 15-year-old Cessna plane that our founder, RT, piloted himself.

Since then, we’ve expanded our fleet to over 1,300 trucks at 12 DCs across the country—all maintained in company garages by our own staff of highly trained mechanics.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/fastFactsDTI21.jpg” alt=”Dot by the numbers” title_text=”Dot by the numbers” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_class=”site-footer” _builder_version=”4.9.11″ background_color=”#f0efef” min_height=”473px” custom_padding=”13px||0px|||” global_module=”28068″ saved_tabs=”all” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_2″ make_equal=”on” module_class=”drivefordotfooter” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ width_tablet=”80%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/DOT_Blue_adv_website.png” _builder_version=”3.27.3″ width=”33%” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”28px” min_height=”195px” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”||-2%” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

877-896-1692

1 Dot Way

P.O. Box 208

Mt. Sterling, IL 62353

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_social_media_follow icon_color=”#ffffff” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ min_height=”12px” border_radii=”on|39px|39px|39px|39px” global_colors_info=”{}” icon_color__hover_enabled=”on”][et_pb_social_media_follow_network social_network=”facebook” url=”https://www.facebook.com/DriveForDot/” icon_color=”#ffffff” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ background_color=”#00578c” global_colors_info=”{}” follow_button=”off” url_new_window=”on”]facebook[/et_pb_social_media_follow_network][et_pb_social_media_follow_network social_network=”twitter” url=”https://twitter.com/DotFoods” icon_color=”#ffffff” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ background_color=”#00578c” global_colors_info=”{}” follow_button=”off” url_new_window=”on”]twitter[/et_pb_social_media_follow_network][et_pb_social_media_follow_network social_network=”linkedin” url=”https://www.linkedin.com/company/dot-foods/” icon_color=”#ffffff” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ background_color=”#00578c” global_colors_info=”{}” follow_button=”off” url_new_window=”on”]linkedin[/et_pb_social_media_follow_network][et_pb_social_media_follow_network social_network=”youtube” url=”https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeMwQjTU7GXO6j_Z_eFfCUA” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ background_color=”#00578c” global_colors_info=”{}” follow_button=”off” url_new_window=”on”]youtube[/et_pb_social_media_follow_network][/et_pb_social_media_follow][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#000000″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”28px” custom_margin=”0px||” custom_margin_tablet=”0%||” custom_margin_phone=”0%||” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

excerpt.rendered: About Dot Transportation In 1960, Dot Foods Founder Robert Tracy was making his first deliveries out of the back of the Tracy family station wagon. Now, Dot Transportation, Inc. (DTI) operates a fleet of over 1,300 trucks out of 12 distribution centers (DC) across the country with the help of 2,000+ employees. Our growth has […]

meta._et_pb_old_content:
Dot Foods is ranked #63 on Forbes Magazine’s list of America’s Largest Private Companies. It is also featured in Jason Jennings’ book, Think Big, Act Small, about successful and innovative American companies.

As its transportation subsidiary, Dot Transportation has grown right along with Dot Foods. The company’s original “fleet” was the Tracy family station wagon and a 15-year-old Cessna plane that RT piloted himself. We’ve expanded to a large fleet of 1,100 trucks…all maintained in company garages by our own staff of trained mechanics.

Culture

Dot’s founders Robert and Dorothy Tracy understood that for their company to be a success, it would have to be built on a foundation of strong values. So they instilled Dot Foods and Dot Transportation with a set of values that have never wavered since the company first started.

From the beginning, these values have formed a bond of trust between Dot and our customers, other business partners and employees. It’s a sense of family, honesty, teamwork, accountability and always putting our customers first. That’s what we expect from our employees, and that’s what our customers expect from us.

Here at Dot, we know the real key to our success is our culture. Small town. Friendly. Honest. Hard working. You’ll find a home here!
